item.description:
In this roundtable discussion we will explore the concept of leadership and the fundamental principles of leading nonprofit organizations. Whether you are at the helm of an organization, a director, a manager or staff member impacted by leadership, this roundtable will expose you understand a variety of viewpoints on the building blocks inherent in strong leadership. Since leadership styles are often tightly knitted to management styles, we will also examine how those styles impact leaders, staff and the organization as a whole.


Meeting Format

1. Introductions (15 mins)

2. Roundtable Discussion: Leadership in Nonprofit Management (60 mins)


  • Leadership in Nonprofit organizations
  • Vision, planning, action and accountability in Leadership
  • Leadership styles, methods and outcomes



4. Announcements, opportunities, connections (10 mins)

5.. Exchange business cards/social networking. (15 mins)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the room 15 minutes early. You'll recognize me from my photo!
item.name: Roundtable Discussion: Leadership in Nonprofit Management
